website_summaries.verdict: Refreshing, artistic design on paddles enlivens play. Quality set that is painted and sealed with no rough edges.
pros: Paddles are designed for all-season use, as they’re unaffected by snow, rain, or moisture
quality is superior to others in the same bracket
cons: Some reports of paddles and grips breaking off after a couple games
Ball that is included is a bit smaller than it should be for proper play

customer_reviews.title: Terrible.
customer_reviews.text: These broke within 5 minutes of playing at the beach. The handles started to snap and the plastic on the handles came off. To make it worse we left them on the porch with the cooler to throw away and the next day there were growing this horrible orange mold that produces a fine dust when we moved them to throw them away. These are so overpriced and I feel so ripped off. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: carli

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these literally fell apart the first time we used them. They aren’t cheap but they are cheaply made. The handles to both paddles completely shattered within a couple hits of the ball.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these were not well made. The edges were a bit sharp, and the coloring was smudged on the paddles. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Pool paddles
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace old wood paddles that had broken last year. These were inexpensive and fit exactly what we were looking for. One handle came loose a little but overall they work well.
customer_reviews.author: KikiD26

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: These literally lasted 3 minutes before they fell apart. Not only did I pack these up, drive them 8 hours, load them on the beach wagon along with four kids, but after 2 minutes I now had garbage that I had to carry around and bring back with us. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Weak product
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive this product. I loved the colors!!! Unfortunately, we will be returning this product because after the second use the paddle snapped off the handle. We're only able to use this two times!!!
customer_reviews.author: M Noecker

customer_reviews.title: BEACH READY !
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing this item! The first time I had to return it due to the ball missing Heavy duty paddle - the ball is a very light weight. I feel like I will loose it in the beach but over all GREAT !
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Very affordable set great for socially distant summer hangs
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty basic set that comes with two wooden paddles (with plastic handles) and one bright pink ball. The wood is quality, the designs are nice and colorful, and I like that the ball is bright enough that you won't lose it. The plastic handles do feel a little flimsy, but as something that only gets used on occasion, they should hold up. And man is sound satisfying when the ball makes contact with the wood.
customer_reviews.author: Jason W Crutchfield

customer_reviews.title: SAD
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product for our vacation and they broke on the first day.
customer_reviews.author: JGH

customer_reviews.title: Great product at an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality paddles along with a soft ball, perfect for summers and back yard play or beach play. Bought 2 of these in 2 different colors from Pro Impact them in different colors and they are great quality.
customer_reviews.author: William neafsey

customer_reviews.title: Great product at an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality paddles along with a soft ball, perfect for summers and back yard play or beach play. Bought 2 of these in 2 different colors from Pro Impact them in different colors and they are great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Prashanth

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Junk! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Handle broke after an hour of play. Very thin wood. Sharp edges. Plastic handles are also sharp as well as very loose. These things are so poorly made. Even the ball is the wrong material and weight. DO NOT BUY!!! Return processing. Zero stars if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Miller

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT get this wet. Falls apart INSTANTLY!
customer_reviews.text: It fell apart (handle broke off) on the first day we used it in the pool. May be ok for dry land but should be called a BEACH ball set if it can’t get wet!!! Lousy purchase
customer_reviews.author: alix

customer_reviews.title: Great beach toy
customer_reviews.text: I like the bright colors of the paddles and the lightweight ball is easy to bounce back-and-forth.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cady

customer_reviews.title: Delivered without the ball
customer_reviews.text: Where is the ball? A little hard to play without it.
customer_reviews.author: A Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This paddle set is not only colorful but works great. We are loving it at the beach this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Christy Teal

customer_reviews.title: Not a solid paddle
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to take and play at the beach. the paddle doesn't feel solid when using with the included ball. Also, the wood was chipped/splintered taking it out of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Sklar

customer_reviews.title: Ball was not shipped
customer_reviews.text: Paddles look great but It didn’t include a ball as advertised. I’m sure it was a mistake. Just want the ball. Not sure how to contact the company.
customer_reviews.author: John Clements

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality at a cheap price.... solid wood, although the ball should be a little bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Milton Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Good buy but don’t love the ball
customer_reviews.text: Overall I love this product. I’m not a big fan of the ball that comes with the paddle boards because it’s challenging to hit it far.
customer_reviews.author: candice pochini

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This product got wet at the beach and the handles on both broke off, very poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M.

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting better service
customer_reviews.text: I recieved my paddles without the balls..the net was broken someone took the balls..so embarrassing
customer_reviews.author: Erika Guembes

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time and money on this
customer_reviews.text: The bag was broken the ball is missing and one of the paddle is broken, such a waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy this item. It's a good quality product and resisted to many drops.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected but wish it came with more than 1 ball, easy to lose lol
customer_reviews.author: Elle mack

customer_reviews.title: Fun on vacation
customer_reviews.text: We got these for the beach. All ages had fun.
customer_reviews.author: Mary simmons

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and sturdy. Wish it came with another ball but good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Pagan

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: We had lots of fun playing with these at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Proffitt

customer_reviews.title: For the backyard, too!
customer_reviews.text: During stay at home times it’s important to find things to do for all the family - and here’s the answer. Even Grandma likes to play with these in the backyard and age seems to be no restriction! Large paddles and small ball - it’s easier to connect than you think! And when the beaches open again, they’ll be fun there, too!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara McArthur

customer_reviews.title: Fun to Play
customer_reviews.text: This paddle isn't the best made one, but it is fun to use. Looks good and the ball is well made. Just dont leave it out in the elements and you should be OK.
customer_reviews.author: TomSTPete

product_meta.title: Pro Impact Beach Paddle Ball Set Comes with 2 Wooden Paddles with Plastic Handle and 1 Ball in a mesh Bag Beach Play Family Games
feature_bullets: ALL-SEASON BEACH PADDLE BALL GAME: This Paddle Ball set from Pro Impact is a great all-season game because it takes the best of badminton, ping pong, pickle ball or tennis and combines it into a fun and exciting game. Another advantage of this game is that it can be played not only on the beach but also in your backyard, park etc. In short, this beach paddle ball game is a great outdoor game for all.

MADE FROM DURABLE & LIGHTWEIGHT MATERIAL: The set consists of 2 colourful wooden paddles and a paddle ball. The paddles are made from good quality wooden material that does not damage easily. Durable paddles are water and sand resistant and stand up to wear and tear which makes them a good choice for your beachside games

COMFORTABLE GRIP THAT ENSURES EASY HANDLING: The plastic handle offers a comfortable grip to the user and also prevents the paddle from slipping from your hand. Each paddle measures 15 inches in length and weighs 490 grams which makes them easy to handle.

COMES WITH A MESH BAG: It becomes difficult for you to carry two paddles and a ball in your hand while you are walking on the beach. To tackle this issue, Pro Impact has provided a mesh bag with this set that easily accommodates the two paddles along with the ball. This makes the set easy to carry wherever you go.

SUITABLE FOR PEOPLE OF ALL AGES: Being a versatile and fun game, it can be enjoyed by people of all ages. It not only ensures quality time on the beach but also helps to improve your hand-eye coordination and ensures a good exercise.
